issue.title: [CF 285] Better suggestion list clicking
issue.body:
Allow users to do something like this when clicking an entry:

Left Click: Insert Name
Right Click: Insert ID

OR

Left Click: Insert whatever is being typed in
Right Click: Insert the opposite of what is being typed in

OR

Click on name to insert the name
Click on the ID to insert the ID

Help me decide which one would be best. Personally, I'm leaning towards the third option. The first one is consistent but confusing, and the second one is just plain confusing.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #285 | Raw

comments.body:
I went with the option that is "just plain confusing". How about that.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Second one is best choice.

Edited Sep 11, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
